issue.title: gzsdf: urdf parser ignores properties for links

content.raw:
I just recompiled gazebo with the most recent changes - that pull request was among them -  and tested it again. The described behaviour is still there.

I'm using [Kobuki's model description](https://github.com/yujinrobot/kobuki) (hydro-devel branch). In order to repeat my results, do 

```
$ rosrun xacro xacro.py kobuki_standalone.urdf.xacro -o kobuki.urdf
$ gzsdf print kobuki.urdf > test.sdf
```
content.html:
